channel.title: Icons for MITB Android app
channel.description:
I've started work on an app for these forums since I'd like to browse them occasionally when I'm not near my computer. I am terrible with photoshop or any those types of programs, so we'd have shit icons if I was doing it. Anyone up to the challenge?
Here's Google's guidelines for making icons for Android: http://developer.android.com/guide/practices/ui_guidelines/icon_design.html
The most important currently is the launcher icon. Menu icons can be worried about later as the layout might change once I'm done, but if you're willing to make a few go right a head.
Looking for:
[ul][li]Launcher Icon[/li] [li]Tab icons ('latest', 'browse' and 'more' for now)[/li] [li]Profile, private messages[/li][/ul]
You can make them look how ever you wish, I have no preferences. And any other you can think of feel free to post so I can to the list.

item.title: Icons for MITB Android app
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

I’ve started work on an app for these forums since I’d like to browse them occasionally when I’m not near my computer.
I am terrible with photoshop or any those types of programs, so we’d have shit icons if I was doing it.
Anyone up to the challenge?

Here’s Google’s guidelines for making icons for Android: http://developer.android.com/guide/practices/ui_guidelines/icon_design.html

The most important currently is the launcher icon. Menu icons can be worried about later as the layout might change once I’m done, but if you’re willing to make a few go right a head.

Looking for:

[ul][li]Launcher Icon[/li]
[li]Tab icons (‘latest’, ‘browse’ and ‘more’ for now)[/li]
[li]Profile, private messages[/li][/ul]

You can make them look how ever you wish, I have no preferences.
And any other you can think of feel free to post so I can to the list.
